data.text: @K7inBangtanLand I have a few options but I’ll probably decide at the last minute 🤦‍♀️😂
@Amie_Koya I’m so excited-hope you have an awesome time 💜
@JenScotlandBTS Did you pick out something nice to wear? 💜
@alyssanaisme Hope you have a wonderful time 💜💜💜
@K7inBangtanLand i'm making lil bags too!! I'm so excited :) I hope you have lots of fun and it ends up being surprisingly relaxing <3

@K7inBangtanLand I'm vaxed, boosted, and will likely choose to wear my mask and that's fine. I think alot of Army are doing the same. But still feels weird to plan that when  all of UK see it as being over now 😩 BUT We're going to have fun !!!! 💜 Cant wait and I hope my cinema has alot of Army!
@K7inBangtanLand These are so lovely & thoughtful 🥰 I’m sure you’ll have an amazing time & meet loads of friendly army just like we do on here! 💜
@lover_yoonjin 😂 well……. Maybe I decant a bottle into a keep cup 😂
@K7inBangtanLand I thought they were real soju and you were taking them to the cinema https://t.co/4U0RCKklj7
@Bts2020Pgd Thank you 💜 Me too-masked, vaccinated and boosted. Hope you have a fab time 💜
